# IoT Docs

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/intro.md): Learn how .NET can be used to build applications for IoT devices and scenarios.

## How-to guides

- [Deployment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/deployment.md): Learn how to deploy .NET apps to ARM single-board computers (SBCs) such as Raspberry Pi.
- [Debugging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/debugging.md): Learn how to debug .NET apps on ARM single-board computers (SBCs) such as Raspberry Pi.
- [Use the IoT libraries on Windows, Linux, and macOS computers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/usb.md): Learn how to develop GPIO, I2C, and SPI code with .NET on PCs.

## Children

- [Quickstarts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/quickstarts/llms.txt)
- [Tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/iot/tutorials/llms.txt)
